right-mediainfo-term:
{{doc-right|mediainfo-term}}
Right to alter the [[d:Special:MyLanguage/Wikidata:Glossary#Term|terms]] of [[d:Wikidata:Glossary#media info|media info]] entities.
slot-name-mediainfo: Label for the part of the page on which structured media info is stored.
wikibase-entity-mediainfo: How we refer to entities of type media info. See also the Wikidata glossary on [[d:Wikidata:Glossary#mediainfo|media info]].
wikibase-mediainfo-summary-wbsetlabel-ad: {{wikibase summary messages|mediainfo|Automatic edit summary generated when creating a file's caption, which appears in the ''captions'' block underneath the thumbnail on the image page. Example of a full edit summary is "Added [en] caption: A cat relaxes in the sunshine.".}}
wikibase-mediainfo-summary-wbsetlabel-re: {{wikibase summary messages|mediainfo|Automatic edit summary generated when removing a file's caption, which appears in the ''captions'' block underneath the thumbnail on the image page. Example edit summary is "Removed [en] label".}}
wikibase-mediainfo-summary-wbsetlabel-se: {{wikibase summary messages|mediainfo|Automatic edit summary generated when editing an file's caption, which appears in the ''captions'' block underneath the thumbnail on the image page. Example of a full edit summary is "Updated [en] caption: A domestic cat relaxes in the sunshine.".}}
wikibasemediainfo-add-property: Placeholder text in autosuggest input for adding new property which can be used to add statements about a File
wikibasemediainfo-add-statement: Button text for adding a statement block for a new wikibase property
wikibasemediainfo-diffview-label: Sub heading for caption changes in a diff.
wikibasemediainfo-entitytermsforlanguage:
List of labels, aliases and descriptions in one or more languages: Heading of the "caption" column.
{{Identical|Caption}}
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-fileinfo-head: Label for the 'File information' tab on the File page
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-structured-da: Label for the 'Structured data' tab on the File page
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-captions-titl:
Title for the section displaying multi-lingual file captions
{{Identical|Caption}}
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-more-language:
Text for link for expanding structured data to see more languages. Parameters:
* $1 - Number of languages, for PLURAL support
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-fewer-languag: Text for link for collapsing structured data to see fewer languages
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-add-caption: Text for link for adding a caption
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-edit-captions: Label text for edit captions icon
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-edit-depicts: Label text for edit depicts icon
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-cancel:
Label for 'cancel' button for editing structured data on file page
{{Identical|Cancel}}
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-cancel-confir: Alert message to confirm user will cancel and discard changes
Title for message to confirm user will cancel and discard changes
Message for button to discard the changes
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-edit: Label for 'edit' button for editing structured data on file page
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-publish: Label for 'publish' button for editing structured data on file page
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-caption-empty: Text to display when a caption is missing for a language, as a call-to-action for the user to add a caption
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-caption-too-s:
Error text for when a caption is too short. Parameters:
* $1 - Number of characters under minimum, for PLURAL support
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-caption-too-l:
Error text for when a caption is too long. Parameters:
* $1 - Number of characters over maximum, for PLURAL support
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-caption-appro:
Warning text when a caption is approaching the length limit. Parameters:
* $1 - Number of characters left before reaching max character count, for PLURAL support
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-statement-val: Title for the value type dropdown
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-statement-cus: Dropdown menu text for 'CUSTOM VALUE' option
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-statement-inv: Text to display when a statement has an invalid value that can't be parsed.
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-statement-no-: Dropdown menu text for 'NO VALUE' option
Text to display when a statement has an explicit 'NO VALUE' value.
Text to display when we want to display statements for a particular property (e.g. depicts) but there is no data for it
Text to display when no results for a query have been found, e.g. in autocomplete widgets
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-statement-som: Dropdown menu text for 'SOME VALUE' option
Text to display when a statement has an explicit 'SOME VALUE' value. The only use case we are currently covering on Commons is that of a missing Wikidata item.
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-statement-err: Text to display when a statement has a wrong kind of value; should never occur.
wikibasemediainfo-filepage-license-title: Title for dialog with licensing instructions
wikibasemediainfo-statements-depicts-tit: Title text for section for adding items depicted in the image
wikibasemediainfo-statements-item-add-qu: Text for button to add a qualifier
wikibasemediainfo-statements-item-input-: Label text for input fields autocompleting Wikidata properties
Placeholder text for input field to search for properties
wikibasemediainfo-statements-item-is-pro:
Text for link when statement is prominent, to turn it normal again.

In the context of "depicts" statements, "prominent" describes a thing or a person that is displayed prominently in an image.
wikibasemediainfo-statements-item-mark-a: Text for link to make statement prominent. "Prominent" must be translated with the same word as in {{msg-mw|Wikibasemediainfo-statements-item-is-prominent}}.
wikibasemediainfo-statements-item-remove: Title text for button to remove a property
wikibasemediainfo-statements-learn-more: Text for link to page to learn more about statements
wikibasemediainfo-statements-remove: Text for button to remove statements
wikibasemediainfo-statements-title-depic: Title for the group of statements for 'Depicts'
wikibasemediainfo-statements-unsupported: Title for popover to inform this is an unsupported property

Content for popover to inform this is an unsupported property. Parameters:
* $1 - List of supported properties
Content for popover to inform this is an unsupported property.
wikibasemediainfo-statements-link-notice: Message to inform the user that the links in the statements below go to an external Wikibase repo's (e.g. Wikidata) pages for their respective entries. Leave as '-' to not display any notice.
Label for the control to dismiss the link notice widget
wikibasemediainfo-remove-all-statements-: Confirmation msg for removing all statements for a property
Title for message to confirm user will remove all statements for a property
Text for button to remove all statements for a property
wikibasemediainfo-precision-input-label: Label for globe coordinate precision input.
wikibasemediainfo-arcminute-label: Label for globe coordinate precision option to an arcminute
wikibasemediainfo-arcsecond-label: Label for globe coordinate precision option to an arcsecond
wikibasemediainfo-tenth-of-arcsecond-lab: Label for globe coordinate precision option to 1/10 of an arcsecond
wikibasemediainfo-hundreth-of-arcsecond-: Label for globe coordinate precision option to 1/100 of an arcsecond
wikibasemediainfo-thousanth-of-arcsecond: Label for globe coordinate precision option to 1/1000 of an arcsecond
wikibasemediainfo-string-input-button-te: Text for button to add a (plain text) statement
wikibasemediainfo-monolingualtext-input-: Text for button to add a monolingual text statement
Placeholder text for monolingual text input field
wikibasemediainfo-time-input-button-text: Text for button to add a time statement
wikibasemediainfo-time-timestamp-empty: Error message when the time input is empty
wikibasemediainfo-time-timestamp-invalid: Error message when the time input is malformed
wikibasemediainfo-time-timestamp-formatt:
Message to display formatted timestamp. Parameters:
* $1 - The formatted time
wikibasemediainfo-time-precision-year1g: Label for time precision for a billion years
wikibasemediainfo-time-precision-year100: Label for time precision for a hundred million years
wikibasemediainfo-time-precision-year10m: Label for time precision for ten million years
wikibasemediainfo-time-precision-year1m: Label for time precision for a million years
wikibasemediainfo-time-precision-year100: Label for time precision for 100,000 years
wikibasemediainfo-time-precision-year10k: Label for time precision for 10,000 years
wikibasemediainfo-time-precision-year1k: Label for time precision for a millenium
wikibasemediainfo-time-precision-year100: Label for time precision for a century
wikibasemediainfo-time-precision-year10: Label for time precision for a decade
wikibasemediainfo-time-precision-year:
Label for time precision for a year
{{identical|Year}}
wikibasemediainfo-time-precision-month:
Label for time precision for a month
{{identical|Month}}
wikibasemediainfo-time-precision-day:
Label for time precision for a day
{{identical|Day}}
wikibasemediainfo-time-precision-hour: Label for time precision for an hour
wikibasemediainfo-time-precision-minute: Label for time precision for a minute
wikibasemediainfo-time-precision-second: Label for time precision for a second
wikibasemediainfo-quantity-input-button-: Text for button to add a numeric/quantity statement
wikibasemediainfo-quantity-unit-placehol: Placeholder text for quantity unit input field
wikibasemediainfo-quantity-unit-label: Label text for quantity unit input field
wikibasemediainfo-quantity-unit-button-t: Text for button to add a quantity unit
wikibasemediainfo-globecoordinate-input-: Text for button to add a globecoordinate statement
wikibasemediainfo-globecoordinate-map-bu: Text for button to expand coordinate input to select on map
wikibasemediainfo-rescore-profile-classi: Classic query independent search profile without boost links (affects fulltext search ranking algorithm).
wikibasemediainfo-special-mediasearch-ti: Title text for the media search special page
wikibasemediainfo-special-mediasearch-co:
Text for button to see next page of results
{{identical|Next}}
wikibasemediainfo-special-mediasearch-ta: Label text for tab with images search results

Label text for tab with audio search results
{{identical|Audio}}
Label text for tab with video search results
Label text for tab with categories and pages search results
Label text for tab with other file results
wikibasemediainfo-special-mediasearch-fi: Label text for dropdown to filter image search results by size
Label text for option to filter media search results by any size
Label text for option to filter media search results by small sizes
Label text for option to filter media search results by medium sizes
Label text for option to filter media search results by large sizes
Label text for option to filter media search results by any file type
Label that precedes sort option values

Label for default sort option (relevance)
{{identical|Relevance}}
Label for recency sort option
Label for popularity sort option
Label text for option to filter media search results by any license
Label text for option to filter media search results by CC-BY licenses
Label text for option to filter media search results by licenses requiring attribution
Label text for option to filter media search results by CC-SA licenses
Label text for option to filter media search results by licenses requiring attribution and same licensing
Label text for option to filter media search results by CC-0 license or public domain media
Label text for option to filter media search results by other licenses
Label text for option to filter by all namespaces

Label text for option to filter by discussion namespaces
{{identical|Discussion}}
Label text for option to filter by general help namespaces
Label text for option to filter by a custom list of namespaces

Label for the button that triggers the namespace filter dialog. Parameters:
* $1 - Current selected filter value message
Title for the namespace filter dialog
Label for the submit action in the namespace filter dialog
wikibasemediainfo-special-mediasearch-no: Message informing the user that no results were found
Tips on how the user could improve their search query
wikibasemediainfo-special-mediasearch-en: Message informing the user that no additional results were found
wikibasemediainfo-special-mediasearch-em:
Text prompting the user to search for media files. Parameters:
* $1 - Total number of media files
wikibasemediainfo-special-mediasearch-cl: Accessible title for search input clear button
wikibasemediainfo-special-mediasearch-in: Visually-hidden label for the Media Search search input
Placeholder text for Media Search search input
wikibasemediainfo-special-mediasearch-lo: Text for the 'load more results' button
wikibasemediainfo-special-mediasearch-qu: Text for the button to go to the file page in the QuickView panel
Text for the button to close the QuickView panel
Text for the button in the QuickView panel to open the preceding result in QuickView
Text for the button in the QuickView panel to open the next result in QuickView
wikibasemediainfo-special-mediasearch-us: Title text for notification notifying users they can change their default search option
Body text for notification notifying users they can change their default search option
Label for button that closes notification
wikibasemediainfo-special-mediasearch-sw: A link so that the user can go to Special:Search
wikibasemediainfo-special-mediasearch-ca:
Meta information for category results. Parameters:
* $1 - Number of category members
* $2 - Number of subcategories
* $3 - Number of files
wikibasemediainfo-special-mediasearch-co:
Text for button to copy text to the clipboard
{{identical|Copy}}
Message shown when copying to the clipboard fails
Message shown when copying to the clipboard succeeds
wikibasemediainfo-special-mediasearch-cl: Label text for the control to clear existing search filters
wikibasemediainfo-special-mediasearch-re:
Total number of results for a search. Parameters:
* $1 - Number of results (totalhits)
wikibasemediainfo-special-mediasearch-wo:
Wordcount of a page, wrapped in parentheses. Parameters:
* $1 - Number of words (wordcount)
wikibasemediainfo-special-mediasearch-di:
Text prompting the user to search for an alternate search term if they entered a likely typo. Parameters:
* $1 - Suggested term
* $2 - Link to search results for suggested term
wikibasemediainfo-special-mediasearch-er: Error message informing the user of an invalid search
Text prompting the user to retry their search query
wikibasemediainfo-special-mediasearch-sp: Title of preference to use Special:Search as the default search (instead of Special:MediaSearch)
Help text for preference to use Special:Search as the default search (instead of Special:MediaSearch)
mediasearch-filter-assessment-picture-of: Refers to the commons image assessment - Picture of the day
Refers to the commons image assessment - Picture of the year
mediasearch-filter-assessment-featured-i: Refers to the commons image assessment - Featured image
mediasearch-filter-assessment-valued-ima: Refers to the commons image assessment - Valued image
mediasearch-filter-assessment-quality-im: Refers to the commons image assessment - Quality image
mediasearch-filter-assessment-menu-label: Label for search filter for commons image community assessments
